website_summaries.verdict: A superior laundry detergent that contains a wide range of naturally derived ingredients.
pros: Free of phthalates, chlorine, formaldehyde, artificial colors, parabens, and animal-derived ingredients
Contains anionic surfactants from plant-derived sources, dirt- and stain-fighting enzymes, and essential oils
cons: Higher price and less detergent per bottle than other detergents

customer_reviews.title: Not the Real Thing!
customer_reviews.text: This is muuuuuuch more watery than the identical bottles I've purchased in an actual store. I've been using this product religiously for years, and the bottle I ordered from Amazon seems to be cut with about 50% water. Maybe this is a recent change from the manufacturer, but it definitely seems like the supplier might be tampering with the integrity of the product! Mrs. Meyer's is awesome though, so I will definitely keep using it-- just not sure if I'll be purchasing from Amazon again.
customer_reviews.author: OhHaiii

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Brand For ANY Cleaning Products!
customer_reviews.text: --If this review helped you, please click "helpful"-- I've been using Mrs. Meyers for years! I love the entire brand! Basil is my absolute favorite scent; so much so that I have even used the hand lotion as a body lotion. Ha! The Honeysuckle, Geranium, and Lavender are also great. Gosh, I have ZERO bad things to say about this brand! The laundry soap in specific cleans so well! I've never had any issues with it. It also doesn't irritate my sensitive skin and keeps the scent well (but it does help if you have the "matching" scent of the dryer sheets). --For more Amazon reviews, follow @CassandraMercedes on Instagram--
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Mercedes Hanes

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t clean my clothes like I’d hoped.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t clean my clothes like I’d hoped. I love all thing Mrs. Meyers and I was so excited to smell fresh basil when my clothes came out of the wash. But when I was folding I saw my kids snotty nose still on one of my pant legs (she’s 1 and I’m her Kleenex without warning 🙄) I don’t generally have to pretreat this e types of “stains” so I’m a little disappointed in its cleaning ability.
customer_reviews.author: Blair D

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using many of the Mrs. Meyer’s cleaning products for awhile now and love them all. There are some great scents and they’re often coming out wit interesting new ones. As far as laundry detergent, I’m as pleased with this as any of the other products. I used to make my own laundry powder and it was very efficient, lasted a long time. I’ve replaced that process and now use this. I love that there is no strong artificial scent. The product doesn’t irritate my skin as some do. It does a very effective job of cleaning and a little goes a long way. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Walter

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful scent
customer_reviews.text: I love Mrs. Meyer's products. I had purchased the All Purpose Cleaner in basil scent and immediately fell in love with it. So... I then bought the detergent in basil, loved it so much that I bought the fabric softener sheets too. I wasn't sure what I was expecting it to smell like, but I really enjoy the fresh clean scent. My two kids have also commented on how much they like it. Mrs. Meyer's detergent is concentrated, cleans our clothes well and smells great, I definitely recommend and will continue to buy.
customer_reviews.author: KimRN

customer_reviews.title: The best use for the delicates & baby cloths  ,expensive for general use . best formula
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the basil , way to strong for me but long lasting . No brainer about the quality of this detergent , the best use of it for high ended side for hand washing of the delicates applicable to many materials even with dry clean label such as silk scarf , ties , lace , viscose blended dress or tops or baby cloths . My fave scent is The Blue Bell , cool floral bouquet of elegance or honey suckle of slightly sweet warm of sugar or the pleasure of French gourmet flavors .
customer_reviews.author: Maika

customer_reviews.title: Does Mrs Meyer need a Mr? Because I’m in love.
customer_reviews.text: Don’t tell my husband, but I’m having a love affair with Mrs Meyer (insert “mail order” bride joke here). Her basily scent makes me feel alive, and her easy-pour/no-mess spout is convenient, and works well enough to make any stain obsolete. She’s powerful and packs a punch, so a little bit goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: This smelled nice in the bottle but not at all by the ...
customer_reviews.text: This smelled nice in the bottle but not at all by the time the clothes were out of the dryer. I also noticed that a lot of the dirt was still attached to the clothes. Sigh. Still on the search for an effective natural detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. E

customer_reviews.title: Love the soap, not the packaging!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry soup smells amazing and it's all natural to boot! I think the actual product is amazing, however I won't buy this again due to the way it's packaged. The lid doesn't have a catcher on it like many other laundry soaps, I've tried. This causes the soap, once you've poured it into the lid to measure, to run down the side of the bottle. I've taken to just pouring the soup directly into my washer but it's a bummer that there's not a better way to measure.
customer_reviews.author: Jacbatson

customer_reviews.title: Basil scent for the win
customer_reviews.text: I'm trying to go all natural in our house so this was my first attempt at a laundry detergent. The smell is amazing, not overbearing (I wouldn't mind it if it was a bit more noticeable), and so far it seems like it's so concentrating that it's not really that more expensive than the full on chemical detergent I used to buy before. Definitely a win win. I just did a load of laundry and everything turned out clean and smelling fresh! I can't believe I'd be this excited to do laundry!
customer_reviews.author: dorkface

customer_reviews.title: Scent SO Strong
customer_reviews.text: Too much. It has a scent that catches in your throat, like perfume. It filled up my whole house and I coughed and sputtered and sneezed for hours before I gave it to my neighbor. Usually, I unilaterally like the Meyers scents, but I won't be trying out the laundry detergent again. It really stayed on my textiles, too, versus just while I was doing laundry. Fine, probably, for someone who isn't super sensitive to heavily scented products. I was seeking a somewhat more "natural" scent, but this really seems like a fragrance blend vs. what it would smell like if it was just essential oils.
customer_reviews.author: Tyson Estes

customer_reviews.title: Sad to report
customer_reviews.text: This is a tough review to give because I LOVE this line of products. Basil is one of my favorite scent and I have used the all purpose cleaner and love the out come. It's great. So I thought I would try the laundry detergent. After using two bottles of detergent alone with the fabric softener and dryer sheets I am sad to say I am in happy. This detergent is not for a busy family. It does not get the clothes clean. The lasting scent on the clothes comes out smelling terrible as well. It is not fresh at all. So sad.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Literski

customer_reviews.title: It’s laundry detergent, if it’s cheap ima repurchase
customer_reviews.text: -Scent is surprisingly pleasant, I was worried it’d be similar to an actually herb smell! It’s not, it’s a fresh scent similar to “fresh linen” + “fresh rain” IMO -Bottle appears small, but if you know how to actually measure your soap:dirt laundry ratio then it lasts. -Doesn’t leave a lingering scent which I like, but I also use extra rinse cycles. I’m sure this varies by machine/wash preference. -Ingredients list posted in photo
customer_reviews.author: Rain

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: Mrs Meyers has some hits and misses, but this scent isn’t so bad. I gave it to a cat rescue for the value for the money and the concentrated formula for loads of more loads of laundry. They said as I had said that they thought that the scent wasn’t bad. It gets clothing and towels and heavy duty items can get clean.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna A. Safranek

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent for spring
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of all Miss Meyers products, including the laundry detergent. I had never tried this sent for a laundry and was excited to get it. I thought it would be refreshing for spring and I was correct. I use this on all delicates and had washables. If you haven't tried something from the mrs. Meyers product line I would suggest dipping your toe into one of her products you won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob's mom

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to measure carefully
customer_reviews.text: I like everything about this except for the bottle cap's (seemingly intentional) lack of clear and easily viewed markings to ensure that you're not over-dispensing. If you go strictly by the label, you could get the advertised number of loads from this bottle, but they make it very easy to misjudge.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Mmmm basil is my favorite
customer_reviews.text: I'm happy with the quality, my clothes are clean and fresh while not using much soap, a half a cap in a full load works great for even muddy things. When the dryer is running, the beautiful scent fills the house with Mrs.Meyers Basil. Lovely plan! I've also found by accident that my clothes don't need a dryer sheet when using this liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: this product cleans very well and my 5yr old with sensitive skin doesnt react to this like she does with Tide
customer_reviews.text: I bought the basil detergent after trying other scents, mainly because it was the least expensive. I didnt care for this particular scent, and will be using it up and just look for my preferred variety (lavender) in the future. That being said, however, this product cleans very well and my 5yr old with sensitive skin doesnt react to this like she does with Tide. My husband reacts to everything *except* Tide, cannot use this, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: A. Nekut

customer_reviews.title: Works well, smells great
customer_reviews.text: Pros: gets clothes clean, light neutral fresh scent, enzymes get out odor and stains, works in any temp water, works for hand washing too, concentrated, more environmentally conscious than most detergents Cons: a bit pricey, bottle is awkward, scent doesn’t last very long unless you use the scent additive or dryer sheets
customer_reviews.author: RedheadwalkingTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Basil is my favorite Mrs Meyer's scent although I like most of them. I have no complaints about the laundry detergent. I use it in an HE front loader and it works well. We don't have stains or anything that needs extra attention so for regular, light loads it works fine for us.
customer_reviews.author: HS Mom

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: I really like this for my small childrens laundry but honestly just doesn't get my work clothes clean enough. I really wanted to switch to this 100% of the time but my scrubs just need the "harsher" detergent. I will continue to use this for my small children for now though
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Simply Fantastic in ALL areas!!! Truly clean, fresh, Cost Efficient!!! Best ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cleans Impeccably well!!! Fantastic value!!! By Far the Best detergent we've ever used!!! We have a small horse training/breeding farm in Florida and cover most every area of it ourselves...Yes, we sure can get Extremely dirty... Mrs. Meyers brings our clothes, accompaniments, horse & dog blankets & accessories back to Clean looking, fresh smelling, great to the touch articles!!! Additionally adds life back to them, and THAT is also a Very Welcomed Plus!!! Loving ALL the Mrs. Meyers products we've used so far!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Rallo

customer_reviews.title: Unpleasant Fragrance
customer_reviews.text: Disappointing product. Initially I loved the basil scent after smelling it in my local Target store. I of course found it a great price on Amazon and immediately ordered it. Unfortunately, after washing my clothes in the detergent, I was completely dissatisfied. My clothes were left with a scent reminiscent of an old attic - in seeing others' reviews it was confirmed that others experienced this mildew-like smell. I had to completely re-wash my clothes using another detergent to remove the unpleasant smell.
customer_reviews.author: M_Loren

customer_reviews.title: Something happens......
customer_reviews.text: Bought this....and other sage scented products from Meyer's....something happens when this sage scent hits my sense of smell. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Christine Larson

customer_reviews.title: I won't buy anything else
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the smell of this detergent!!! I have very sensitive skin and cannot usually use detergents with fragrance. Mrs. Meyer's is different though and I'm not quite sure why. BUT I will take it! It gets dirt out of your clothes and can be used as a stain remover, as well. It will be hard to get me to ever switch from this brand/ detergent.
customer_reviews.author: M. Howell

customer_reviews.title: Makes clothes smell wonderful and gets them very clean
customer_reviews.text: Great price for Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day! I love this detergent. Though a little more expensive then other brands, it makes clothes smell so good and gets them very clean. This size lasts me for months, because it only takes a small amount (measuring cap included) It actually lasts more than 60 wash loads if you use the measuring cap. I wouldn't use any other type of detergent now that I've tried this. This is my 3rd bottle in the last year and a half.
customer_reviews.author: Blue DragonflyTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Product was leaking during shipping
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product but not cheap and when it comes leaking- It was leaking through the bag and the box. Thank goodness everything else in the box was wrapped but now I have lost almost half a bottle to shipping!!
customer_reviews.author: S. K. Levine

customer_reviews.title: Just as good as commercial detergents
customer_reviews.text: The basil scent is amazing. Really great detergent - I work in an animal shelter and get pretty gross most days but this detergent cleans my work clothes just as well as commercial detergents without all the harsh ingredients. I switched all my cleaning/washing supplies to Mrs. Meyers.
customer_reviews.author: Kaleb

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: This does clean clothes, to the point that I have no complaints other than the smell, which is completely subjective. Truly however, this stuff reeks to me like sweaty gym socks and I'm giving it away.
customer_reviews.author: Tiwohunter

customer_reviews.title: Leaks all over in shipment
customer_reviews.text: This will leak all over during shipment. You will lose at leas 2 cups worth of soap. 3rd time is a charm for me of the leaking. This time it leaked over half the bottle and ruined 3 other Christmas gifts. Go to Target and buy it!
customer_reviews.author: bsheNebraska

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t appear to be the real thing (basil fragrance)
customer_reviews.text: This doesn’t appear to be the real product which I have used for years. It seems to have been watered down. It has a thin, watery consistency unlike the other bottles I have used and it is very sudsy in the bottle which doesn’t happen with the legitimate product. Beware.
customer_reviews.author: Voracious Reader

customer_reviews.title: Clean and great smelling
customer_reviews.text: This is the first time I’ve used a natural laundry soap, but I’ve been trying to use less chemicals in my home, so I went hunting for a good laundry soap. I was a little nervous at first when I saw the reviews saying that the Basil scent was musty or smelled sour, but I just washed and dried my first load of clothes and they came out clean and smelling wonderful!! I am very happy!!
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Shopper

customer_reviews.title: If your repelled by artificial fragrances don't buy this. ...
customer_reviews.text: If your repelled by artificial fragrances don't buy this...first whiff I thought fa-breeze. Been using Costco brand but it's not always convenient! Will have to keep searching!
customer_reviews.author: K. Doyle

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't clean clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I have buy and love every Mrs. Meyers basil scent product. The laundry detergent, unfortunately doesn't work well. It smells nice, but your clothes won't! It doesn't clean well. My husband is a runner and this especially doesn't clean athletic clothes. I wanted it to work, but won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tresca

customer_reviews.title: Sucks
customer_reviews.text: This soap does not clean. I have no idea why people love it. My whites look dingy, it doesn't even try to get any spots out, and it will do absolutely nothing for smells. If you sit by a campfire, your clothes will smell like campfire unless you use good laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: Love this product I just think it is over priced here. I end up buying it at Costco because it is cheaper, but they give you 3 smaller bottles which seems like a waste of plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Dean

customer_reviews.title: Works but isn’t worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This works just as good as tide or a generic brand. The seller has been great but the product is nothing special unless your into that organic clean earth clean body stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the Meyer's products but did not care for this laundry soap for the price. It is faint in aroma and I didn't notice any difference in the cleaning power and I usually use Purex, so a big price difference. I will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Scent stays for a long time and is amazing
customer_reviews.text: This again like the other Meyers products smells amazing and makes your clothes and towels smell so good. It is a clean and earthy scent, which is weird. But good. We have a septic system so it's a plus to have good smelling stuff and non harmful.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't appear to be authentic Ms. Meyer's Basil Detergent
customer_reviews.text: This detergent does not have the scent or consistency of Ms. Meyer's Basil Detergent. It seems like it is something else. It has no lovely scent like the real Ms. Meyer's. In addition, only one of the 2 bottles arrived in the damaged box. I am sending the one I got back with a request for a refund for the whole order. It is unusable. I wonder what is in the bottle?
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I don't like many of the Mrs. Meyer's scents, but this one I could bathe in, I love it so much! I buy all the products I can find in this scent. It cleans well and I have no complaints. The clothes are lightly scented when they come out of the washer. There is a lot less harmful stuff in Mrs. Meyers products than conventional cleaning/laundry/personal care products. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Lori A. Wilhide

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: So I was hesitant to purchase something with a "Basil" scent for my laundry but kept hearing from other people how wonderful it was. Wow! Were they right. I love this soft, fresh scent and will def. purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Flmof3

customer_reviews.title: Best scent!
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent!! It’s So not typical for a detergent. I can’t describe it but it’s amazing. Once clothing is washed it’s very subtle and not over powering. Cleans cloths well - but some tough stains still need pretreating. Love that it’s natural.
customer_reviews.author: Yosef B.

customer_reviews.title: It's not as good as it sounds.
customer_reviews.text: After using it for more than 3 months, I made a feedback. I saw that the online evaluation of this cleaner was very good, so I chose it. It was j who found that his cleaning ability was generally in the first place. It's not as good as it sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent but the Basil smell is odd
customer_reviews.text: I think I will switch back to honeysuckle. I decided to try the Basil because - why not. It reminds me a little of cucumber , but overall not really fond of the scent. I will go back to honeysuckle which I love.
customer_reviews.author: Lin K.

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: I like the basil scent. I use with the beads and the dryer sheets. Seems to work well in getting clothing clean.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Gross!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves clothes smelling like sour milk, and I don't even drink milk. From other reviews it could be a supplier issue, but I'm unlikely to purchase again period.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Beware of tampered product...
customer_reviews.text: This last Subscribe & Save bottle I received was not packaged the same, was not in wrapping, there was an odd scent, and seemed like it was completely watered down. I've ended up using double the amount on every load of laundry :( Hoping my next delivery will be back to the normal product.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, cleans my close and smells bomb. I was hesitant at first because I read a lot of reviews saying it came really runny and didn’t clean well, but luckily I guess my bottle came from a good batch!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Get this!!
customer_reviews.text: Ill never go back to the big brands! This stuff has a lovely, subtle scent and no residue or build up on my clothes or in my machine. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Couton

customer_reviews.title: Was shipped UNCAPPED and destroyed its own packaging
customer_reviews.text: I think I would have liked this, it smells good, but it was shipped uncapped. So of course this whole jug of nice smelling laundry detergent leaked out into the plastic bag encasing it, which also ruptured and leaked out into the box, destroying the box. I’m supposed to return this to get my money back, but am I just supposed to ship back a sticky, empty bottle? W T F
customer_reviews.author: Koaladillo

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent and detergent
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. I love this basil scent detergent and absolutely enjoy the smell of my clothes. I was introduced to this three years ago and it is by far my favorite scent.
customer_reviews.author: Wabih

customer_reviews.title: Great, clean, odorless
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent is quite great. It cleans my clothes well without the harsh chemicals. However, one thing I've noticed is that even right after drying, the clothes have no laundry odor. It is quite strange to smell odorless clothes but it certainly isn't a negative.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Vu

customer_reviews.title: Leaves black clothes looking awesome
customer_reviews.text: Only detergent I can find that eliminates white residue on black clothes I love it
customer_reviews.author: joanne Badilla

customer_reviews.title: Love the scent
customer_reviews.text: I love using a more natural product for my laundry and I love the basil scent. Mrs Meyers basil does not smell like fresh real basil that you'd eat, but it is a very lovely and addictive scent!
customer_reviews.author: Ella Belle

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes very little to wash clothes. I don’t like a heavy scent so this is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Robert Evans

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I've officially switched to Meyer's products all around the house and this is one of my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Love Mrs. Meyers Basil
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying out different detergents for awhile now. I was looking for something that smelt great but was also more environmentally friendly. I love Mr.s Meyers basil laundry detergent. It smells amazing and has gotten out some really bad stains. The smell lasts even after the dryer and added bonus of no phthalates, chlorine, formaldehyde, artificial colors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Detergent
customer_reviews.text: I love this detergent, I’m a huge fan of Mrs. Myers products so I’m not surprised. Smells fantastic and works great.
customer_reviews.author: ee

customer_reviews.title: Cleans decently, smells sour.
customer_reviews.text: I really hate the smell of this. It smells sour. I guess it cleans well enough, but I cant keep using it and smelling like mildew. I have to give it away and try something new. I'm so disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Basil Fresh
customer_reviews.text: Purchasing this through Amazon saved a lot of money! Scent is faint and leans more toward fresh...
customer_reviews.author: JA Pittsburgh

customer_reviews.title: I never want to use anything else
customer_reviews.text: Tried this because I wanted to maximize my Amazon subscription products. The smell was AMAZING and my clothes came out of the washer feeling softer. It was a noticeable difference. I'll never go back to what I was using before.
customer_reviews.author: Ami M.

customer_reviews.title: Switched to Mrs. Meyers - won’t go back
customer_reviews.text: Switching to Mrs. Myers has been a great change. I particularly like that it smells fresh without all the toxicity of main stream brands.
customer_reviews.author: brwneyedsusan

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great and Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this detergent after a friend turned me onto the household cleaner in the Basil Scent. I absolutely love the fresh clean smell of this detergent! It leaves clothes smelling good and super soft.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: not great on stains
customer_reviews.text: smells really great - but I still end up with a lot of stains on my clothes, always misses the turmeric stains and wont take out tough grease. (I cook a lot) I like it, but ive had better regular washes with homemade recipes.
customer_reviews.author: Inanna

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I love the fresh scent. This detergent is concentrated, so a little goes a long way. I use it for pre-spotting, too. A good value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Karen M. Parker

customer_reviews.title: Great detergent
customer_reviews.text: This detergent works really well in an HE front loader. It does a great job on stains, rinses out thoroughly and leaves a subtle, marvelous scent.
customer_reviews.author: Geralyn

customer_reviews.title: Works great light scent!
customer_reviews.text: I tried this out because my family has sensitive skin, and I wanted to find a detergent that was more natural with less chemicals. I works great at getting the cloths clean and if you buy it in bulk isn’t too expensive. Very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Amazing.
customer_reviews.text: Smells so good. I love it. I have sensitive skin and this soap is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Sequin Sara

customer_reviews.title: Fresh clothing every time
customer_reviews.text: The scent that this leaves in my clothing is just wonderful. Smell is long lasting and super fresh, more of a natural scent rather than some over perfumed scent. You get a lot of loads out of the bottle since it is HE. Works great for sheets too.
customer_reviews.author: M. Allen

customer_reviews.title: ❤️ Mrs Meyers
customer_reviews.text: I love everything about Mrs. Meyers. I’ll never go back to conventional products.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Crow

customer_reviews.title: Husband likes the scent
customer_reviews.text: This appears to clean well. My husband likes this scent so guess we will keep using it. I would prefer an unscented or less strong smelling scent with this brand of products but I haven't found one yet.
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell and this brand. This works awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie H

customer_reviews.title: GREAT laundry for sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scent out of all the Mrs. Meyers products. I clean my and my 15 month old's laundry with this and it has not irritated our skin. We both have mild sensitivity to laundry detergent. I also I like the consistency of the product. Its not too thick but its also not runny.
customer_reviews.author: yesamazon

customer_reviews.title: Mmmmm....smells good!
customer_reviews.text: I love using this along with all the other Mrs. Meyer's Basil products. It truly does work with just the small amount the cap calls for. It is outlasting my previous favorite, Persil and works just as well!
customer_reviews.author: robin lovelady

customer_reviews.title: SoSo
customer_reviews.text: Soso. I like the smell however after it sits without immediate use, the smell isn't so great.
customer_reviews.author: Just Cass

customer_reviews.title: ALWAYS USE THIS
customer_reviews.text: great stuff on laundry makes it clean and smells refreshing
customer_reviews.author: Christian Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Watered down
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased this soap from the store plenty of times and am very upset that when I got mine today it seems watered down it usually a very thick consistency. Is the soap being tampered with. This is expensive as it is and is upsetting if I’m not getting what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: Mp369

customer_reviews.title: Smells great no complaints
customer_reviews.text: Great natural detergent. The smell lasts too. I would compare it’s stain removal to tide. Very happy w it
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Shunk

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: I am allergic to most of the smell good stuff, but not this! It smells divine. Worth the extra money! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love their products. I have allergies and the scents don’t seem to aggravate this.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Basil Scent is the best
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite scent of the Mrs. Meyers line of cleaning products. I only wish they made scent boosters for it. I used to buy the 4x concentrated one that comes in a smaller bottle, but claims it washes the same amount. I feel better purchasing the larger bottle even if it's 2x concentrate instead of 4x.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa M.

customer_reviews.title: Too fragrant for me.  Back to Trader Joe’s natural lavender scent.
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent but it is super concentrated and makes me sneeze. Concentrated so it’s a better value because you use less.
customer_reviews.author: Gearhead

customer_reviews.title: Heavenly scent
customer_reviews.text: Love it. So fresh smelling. Laundry smells great. Wonderful to lie down on sheets laundered with this. I especially love the basil. To me it doesn't quite smell like basil -- it's better. Laundry gets as clean with this as it does with Tide. Very concentrated. So it will last a long time. Also for HE washers.
customer_reviews.author: PJ Tennies

customer_reviews.title: So fresh and so clean!
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, works well, priced approximately. Lasts way longer than I thought it would too!
customer_reviews.author: Liz Backer

customer_reviews.title: Clean clothes & smells great
customer_reviews.text: Our clothes have never felt so clean. We're hooked in this household and have subscribed to the laundry detergent. A little goes a long way, and the basil scent is fantastic (wasn't sure how basil clothes would smell...they smell great). We're also using the Mrs. Meyers fabric softener.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not clean the clothes
customer_reviews.text: Does not clean the clothes - They are still covered in food and smell
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best scent. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I love the BASIL scent (even though I don't think it smells anything like basil. Whatever it smells like, I have no idea but it's divine.
customer_reviews.author: Archie Gillis

customer_reviews.title: Green & clean
customer_reviews.text: Cleans so well. So happy I was able to find my favorite scent and with added bonus of being natural.
customer_reviews.author: Janet Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Try it once, you'll be hooked!
customer_reviews.text: Obsessed with Mrs. Meyers!! Fast shipping! Comes with the top taped, and in a plastic bag so you don't have to worry about opening a messy box ever! Smells just as amazing as the Mrs. meyers dish soap and dryer sheets. I found that the sent of just the detergent will last without the dryer sheets, but I can't get enough of this fresh and light scent!!
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie Dunnigan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing scent !
customer_reviews.text: The soap is good for not too heavy duty laundry . The scent is amazing . But the Amazon prime package was very poor with liquid soap all over the bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Confetti and bubbles

customer_reviews.title: Smells and works great!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the scent of this product! And I also love how little liquid is needed per laundry load. Makes the bottle last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn

customer_reviews.title: Love this detergent.  Arrived with NO leaking!
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent. We are on septic so natural is best. Arrived surprisingly with no leaks! Loved not having to hit the store for just laundry detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Daddydell

customer_reviews.title: The best detergent
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells amazing and always leaves my clothes feeling clean. Buyer beware though, this is only the 2X formula. I thought I was getting a good deal on the 4X one until it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Sean C Lawler

customer_reviews.title: Goooood
customer_reviews.text: Feels like this lasts fivever. Smells great in the bottle, but more subtler on the clothes which I don't mind it not being heavily perfumed and it can be solved by adding a little more detergent as well.
customer_reviews.author: Nineteen

customer_reviews.title: Light and lovely clean scent. Basil is my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This all natural soap does the job on dirt while safe for the planet. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Coach Bella

customer_reviews.title: Great cleaning, great small
customer_reviews.text: Great job cleaning the clothes, love the smell. It isn't overpowering, just a light clean smell.
customer_reviews.author: BMH

customer_reviews.title: Mrs. Meyer's Laundry Detergent-- I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. This detergent leaves the clothes smelling so fresh & clean. I also can use only 1/4 cup in my front loader, & it's very cost effective. It may seem expensive, but in the long run ,it's really competitively priced. And good for the environment.
customer_reviews.author: Allison K

customer_reviews.title: Amazing detergent
customer_reviews.text: The product works great! It smells great, it washes great. The only problem is Amazon did poorly with shipping and it came cracked with half of it dumped out everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Wilson Family

customer_reviews.title: Cleans clothes, what else do I need!?
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected, no issues, love the smell and the brand!
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

product_meta.title: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Liquid Laundry Detergent, Cruelty Free and Biodegradable Formula, Basil Scent, 64 oz
product_meta.description: Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day Basil scented laundry detergent features hard-working yet gentle cleaning agents, while also providing a special, singular scent for your entire home. Basil has a cool, crisp aroma that is uplifting & grounding, familiar & exotic – all at one time. Such an inviting herbal fragrance, the garden's friendly boost of green. This concentrated laundry detergent is effective yet gentle on clothes. Containing surfactants from plant-derived sources, dirt and stain-fighting enzymes, other thoughtfully chosen ingredients and, of course, those important essential oils, our laundry soap really packs a punch when it comes to removing dirt and grime. This biodegradable laundry detergent is HE compatible. Concentrated for 64 loads of laundry. Also available in other garden inspired scents and products such as body lotions, liquid hand soaps, candles, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer’s – rooted in goodness.
feature_bullets: Concentrated detergent formula is effective yet gentle on clothes
Contains plant-derived cleaning ingredients with dirt and stain-fighting enzymes
Biodegradable, HE laundry detergent for use in high efficiency and conventional washing machines
Garden-fresh basil scented laundry soap with a cool, crisp fragrance that is uplifting & grounding

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
